long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Write entire emails and messages using KhanfarChatGPT Mail AI (privacy-friendly). Works on all sites
Privacy-friendly Chrome extension that uses KhanfarChatGPT Mail AI to generate entire emails and messages based on a few keywords that you input.
It works on all sites!
Enhanced support for Gmail for even better user experience. 
_______________________________
HOW TO USE ON ALL SITES
1) Click on the extension icon
2) A popup window will appear
3) Briefly enter what do you want to write about and hit "Generate Response" button.

________________________
HOW TO USE ON GMAIL
How to generate email reply in Gmail:
1) Go to Gmail, open an email, and reply to it.
2) Click the KhanfarChatGPT Mail extension button in the Gmail reply box.
3) Briefly enter what you want to reply to and hit "Generate Reply" button.

How to generate a new email in Gmail:
1) Go to Gmail, compose new email.
2) Click the KhanfarChatGPT Mail extension button in the Gmail textbox.
3) Briefly enter what you want to write an email about and hit "Generate Email" button.


How to make it work on Brave browser:
If you are using Brave browser, follow these steps to make it work.
- Go to brave://settings/shields
- Disable "Prevent sites from fingerprinting me based on my language preferences" .
